name: DHIA
description:
Dhia looks at me with sad eyes.

I want to comfort her but I don't know how.

As I try to walk towards her, she dissapears.

I was too late.

DHIA is a short visual novel that tells a story set in Indonesia about a student that gets paired up with a classmate in a photography assignment. Thinking it will be an easy task, the protagonist unexpectedly gets tangled up in bullying and other problems his partner faces. Will he be able to save his partner before she becomes completely helpless?

SCREENSHOTS:


This game is free to play ! Made by Jaalexa <3
